text: URGENT: Your account has been compromised! Click here immediately to secure your account: http://secure-verify.com/login?user=12345
Dear Customer, We've detected unusual activity on your PayPal account. Verify now: http://paypa1-secure.net/verify
CONGRATULATIONS! You've won $1,000,000 in our lottery! Claim your prize: http://lottery-winner.xyz/claim
Your Amazon order #123-456-789 has been shipped. Track your package at amazon.com
Hi John, the meeting tomorrow has been moved to 3pm. Let me know if that works for you. - Sarah
Your Netflix subscription will renew next month. No action needed.
ALERT: Your Apple ID was used to sign in to iCloud. If this wasn't you, click here: http://apple-verify.co/secure
Team, please review the attached quarterly report before Friday's presentation. Thanks, Mike
Your Microsoft account password expires in 24 hours! Update now: http://microsoft-account.info/reset
Hey, great catching up yesterday! Let's do lunch next week. - David
IMPORTANT: Your bank account will be suspended! Verify identity: http://bank-secure.net/verify
Thanks for your purchase at Best Buy. Your receipt is attached.
Dear valued customer, your account requires immediate verification. Click here: http://secure-banking.xyz
The project deadline has been extended to next Friday. Please update your schedules accordingly.
FINAL WARNING: Your account access will be terminated! Act now: http://account-verify.com
Hi everyone, please remember to submit your timesheets by end of day Friday.
Your Instagram password was changed. If this wasn't you: http://instagram-security.net/recover
Welcome to our newsletter! You'll receive weekly updates on our latest products.
SECURITY ALERT: Unauthorized login detected! Secure your account: http://secure-login.xyz/protect
Happy birthday! Wishing you a wonderful day filled with joy and celebration.
Your package from UPS is on its way. Expected delivery: Tomorrow
URGENT NOTICE: Your email storage is full! Upgrade now: http://email-upgrade.net/storage
Reminder: Your dentist appointment is scheduled for Monday at 10am
Your PayPal transfer of $500 was successful. Reference: TXN123456
WARNING: Your computer may be infected! Download our security tool: http://antivirus-scan.com
Thanks for attending the webinar. Here are the slides as promised.
Dear User, Your account will be closed in 48 hours! Confirm identity: http://account-secure.xyz
Lunch is ready in the break room. Feel free to grab some food!
Your Facebook account has been locked. Verify now: http://fb-security.net/unlock
Meeting notes from today's standup are in the shared drive.
ACT NOW: Limited time offer expires in 2 hours! Click: http://special-deal.xyz
Great job on the presentation today! The client was very impressed.
IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Verify your account information: http://verify-account.com
Don't forget: potluck lunch this Friday. Sign up sheet in the kitchen.
Your Apple ID has been disabled. Restore access: http://apple-support.info/restore
Looking forward to the team building event next month!
CRITICAL: Your password has been compromised! Change immediately: http://password-reset.xyz
The new office supplies have arrived. They're in the storage room.
Dear customer, unusual activity detected. Verify: http://bank-verify.net/confirm
Happy holidays from our team! Wishing you a peaceful new year.
WARNING: Your subscription expires today! Renew: http://subscription-renew.com
Please review and sign the updated employee handbook by Friday.
Your Dropbox storage is almost full! Upgrade for free: http://dropbox-upgrade.xyz
Congratulations on your promotion! Well deserved.
ALERT: Someone tried to access your account! Secure it: http://account-protect.net
Remember to update your direct deposit information for next month's payroll.
Your order has been delivered. We hope you enjoy your purchase!
FINAL NOTICE: Account suspension imminent! Act now: http://save-account.com
The coffee machine in the break room has been fixed.
Verify your identity to prevent account lockout: http://identity-verify.xyz
Thanks for being a loyal customer. Here's a 10% discount code: THANKS10
